alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Newton (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 8:23PM CDT until June 16 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Newton County in east central Mississippi... Southwestern Lauderdale County in east central Mississippi... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Stratton, or near Decatur, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Meridian, Union, Decatur, Collinsville, Marion, Nellieburg, Hickory, Chunky, Zero, Stratton, Meehan, Savoy, Suqualena, Duffee and Little Rock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
